greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-x+sqrt(1-6x+x^2))/2 in powers of x.
comment: Series reversion of x(Sum_{k>=0} a(k)x^k) is x(Sum_{k>=0} A027307(k)x^k).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: Given g.f. A(x), y=A(x)x satisfies 0=f(x, y) where f(x, y)=y(y-x)+(x+y)x^2 . - _Michael Somos_, May 23 2005
G.f.: Q(0) where Q(k) = 1 + k*(1-x) - x - x*(k+1)*(k+2)/Q(k+1); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Mar 14 2013
D-finite with recurrence: n*a(n) +3*(-2*n+3)*a(n-1) +(n-3)*a(n-2)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 20 2020
xref: A minor variation of A006318. a(n)=-A006318(n-1), n>1.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jun 28 2003
